name: Rob the DiceRoller
description:
(NOTE : Level 2 - 2 and 2 - 3 are broken for now :(, please ignore them)

Rob the Dice Roller: 

- use the arrow keys to move Rob around and push dice into the correct spot 

- use R to restart a level: useful if you got stuck 

- move the mouse and scroll to move the camera and zoom in and out 

The game features several levels across 3 worlds, with uniques puzzles in each. 

It gradually introduces new mechanics for you to play with. It is in a playable state but we might polish it in the near future. 

We didn't have the time to use every mechanic we implemented, so we have room for a lot more levels. 

The menus are a bit rough for now, but we believe that if you power through you will find a nice game! 

It is our first game jam together, and our first (almost) finished game! 

Have fun! Rob hopes you had a wonderful time in this game jam. Bashen & Mitrano.
